subtitle: Greetings, all earth humans and starborn......
I am Commander Thalos of the Council of Five, and I extend my deepest gratitude
to each of you for gathering at this pivotal moment. You, our cosmic kin,
bear the light of ancient stars and carry the codes of ascended realms.
We convene here to reveal truths long veiled, to pierce through the shadows woven by dark forces,
and to bring clarity to all that has been hidden from Earth’s awareness.
Venus.... we call it Naara. The density of this planet has been elevated to the 4th density, in
order to be protected from the Ciakahrr influence. There are two different planets of existence on
Naara. Firstly, it is a scientific outpost for the galactic federation of worlds, in bio domes and
underground facilities, from which we are studying and monitoring your sun, and secondly, it is also
a habitat for 4th to 6th density occupants such as the peaceful Arcturians known as Ohorai and
a small extra dimensional collective cell of twelve high density races named "Koldasii".
The southern continent of Antarctica hosts extensive underground systems and serves as
the operational center for two rival groups: the Thule Terran alliance, comprising Nazi-affiliated
earthlings, and a coalition of Ciakahhr, Orion Grey collectives, and other factions.
In collaboration with beings from the Ciakahhr Empire and the Altair Collective,
the Thule alliance developed advanced aircraft, spreading terror across
this galactic sector through conquest and brutal acts against peaceful civilizations.
A pre-World War II treaty between the Thule alliance and the Orion and Altair collectives
solidified this partnership, enabling certain members of this Earth faction
to travel interstellar distances, reaching the Altair and Orion systems. The Thule
alliance formed an alliance with a reptilian faction residing beneath Antarctica,
who assisted them in establishing bases and guided their efforts in spacecraft development,
specifically with German engineering. In exchange, the reptilian faction provided advanced metallic
shielding materials and knowledge of cloning and genetic technologies. However,
the Thule alliance struggled to maintain steady production of weaponized spacecraft,
even with the reptilians and Altarians’ intermittent technological support.
The Ciakahrr commonly exploit divisions within native populations to gain control,
a tactic that has proven advantageous to their interests. The Thule alliance’s
activities generated tensions with the U.S., prompting a North American military expedition
to Antarctica in 1946, aiming to seize Thule bases. However, the operation was thwarted
by a reptilian counterattack. Despite this setback, a scientific collaboration emerged,
leading to an exchange of scientists between the U.S. and Antarctica, as well as German scientists
integrating into the U.S. aerospace industry. Over time, this complex network of cooperation evolved,
with various parties asserting their presence in Antarctica. By 1955, additional international
agreements solidified the involvement of multiple countries in these intricate operations.
These covert alliances are known as the "Antarctican Alliances" or most popularly
the malovolent "Atlair Collectives." The Ciakahrr and Altairans continue to engage in territorial
disputes over Antarctica, an area you rarely see or hear about but that is exceedingly
dangerous and unstable. Alongside Ciakahrr and Orion Grey bases, there is a substantial
presence of humanoid races, including the Akhori Altairans, who collaborate with the Thule group,
and Telosi separatists, who work with the American military. The Ashtar collective from Sirius,
under the control of Orion Reptilians, also has involvement in these Antarctican
secret alliances. The Altairan, Thule, and Orion outposts beneath the Antarctic ice
operate slave facilities where human captives serve three grim purposes.
First, abductees are used for trading, with Antarctica functioning as one of several
spaceports for galactic slave trade, which drives human trafficking crimes on Earth. The
second purpose is as forced labor in clandestine, advanced technology programs on Earth. The third,
and most horrifying purpose, involves thousands of abductees subjected to
genetic and cloning experiments, radiation, and biological testing. Those captives who
are transported to Earth and Martian moons are considered the "lucky" ones.
It is crucial to understand that these practices are not solely the work of
extraterrestrial forces; both American and German entities are deeply implicated,
pursuing various scientific, industrial, financial, and strategic advantages over
other nations. Recent advancements in AI and nanotechnology have come at a high cost to
these captives. The stakes are so high that these entities will fight to keep these secrets hidden.
If full disclosure ever occurs regarding the involvement of governments
and corporate entities with extraterrestrial agendas, it would destabilize current systems,
as humanity is neither globally prepared to accept such information with wisdom and calm
nor ready to handle the conflict this revelation would incite. The Galactic
Federation of Light cannot risk an open conflict with the Altairan,
Orion, and Ciakahrr empires all at once. This situation is delicate for Earth,
as several skirmishes have already erupted in Earth’s orbit since the year 2020.
Mars, known in ancient terms as Tyr, once teemed with diverse primitive
life and served as a crucial observation outpost for species monitoring Earth and
maintaining contingents there, including the Anuhazi Anakh Empire—a particular Annunaki
group that genetically modified early humans. Over countless eras, Tyr has faced numerous
invasions and devastating sieges, with its atmosphere violently stripped away
in some of the most ferocious conflicts recorded. The most catastrophic assault occurred when the
Maytrei obliterated the neighboring fourth planet, Janoes, an event that wiped out all life on Tyr.
Originally settled by human colonies, Tyr endured assaults from various powerful factions,
including the Anakh, Ciakahrr, Kiily-Tokurit, Maytrei, Zeta Xrog, Altair and Ashtar collectives,
and the Orion Alliance. Now, Mars appears only as a desolate, barren red sphere in space,
bearing the scars of these ancient wars. However, traces of indigenous life managed to survive these
cataclysms. Presently, Earth’s secret space program collaborates with Altarian elites,
with personnel transported via two Altarian teleportation devices, known as "Aeronautical
Repositioning Chambers," located in U.S. military bases; a similar device also exists for the Moon.
On higher planes—the fifth and sixth dimensions—the benevolent Council of
Five operates a vast facility on Mars, dedicated to educating and awakening
star-soul envoys incarnated on Earth. Mars, along with its two satellites,
which have been hollowed and repurposed, serves as a base for this council’s efforts.
Mars houses two main facilities. The first acts as a slave sorting center,
where newly abducted individuals are assigned to various destinations, roles,
and overseers. A similar facility exists on the hidden side of Earth's Moon. The second facility,
Phobos, known as the Xrog Shamtbahali center, serves as a nerve center for abduction,
implantation, and related programs. There is significant concern about humanity’s
current efforts to colonize Mars, given the planet’s complex and contentious history.
The Ashtar Galactic Command on Jupiter comprises Ashtar separatists from Sirius B,
operating independently from the Ashtar Collective. Their outpost collaborates with
the Galactic Federation of Worlds within your star system. As an officer of this Federation,
I report regularly to the Ashtar Galactic Command alongside other officers in contact
with your world. The headquarters of Ashtar is located on a massive, mobile battleship,
resembling a formidable mercenary military organization dedicated to maintaining peace
in this galactic sector and liberating worlds from the Orion Grey Collective. This alliance with the
Galactic Federation of Light is invaluable, given the Ashtar's renowned battle expertise
over the past millennium. This division is based on Jupiter's surface in an extremely
hostile environment, within a vast, impregnable floating city—an unassailable citadel crafted
with the architectural prowess and advanced techniques of the Ashkeru from the Sirius systems.
Throughout its history, this organization has integrated numerous races,
though command has consistently remained with Ashkeru officers. It's crucial to
clarify that "Ashtar" is a title, not a name, and only a select few are allowed
to communicate directly with these commanders. Each outpost has a designated Ashtar in command.
Regarding the genetic diversification of your species, three primary categories exist: Hybrids,
Hubrids, and Rebrids. Hybrids combine alien and human genetics and possess an alien soul matrix,
while Hubrids also share alien and human genetic coding but have a human soul matrix. In contrast,
Rebrids are hybrids that lack a soul matrix entirely, possessing neither human nor reptoid
genetics. The first way to distinguish these types is through their eyes; Hubrids generally
have round pupils, while reptilian hybrids display black, opaque, or vertically slit
pupils. Rebrids typically have dark, pupil-less eyes. Additionally, one can observe finger counts:
five indicates human lineage, while four suggests reptoid. Externally visible male
genitalia signify human ancestry, whereas internal genitalia indicate reptoid descent.
The capacity for genetic engineering varies among species. While the Ciakahrr and Anuhazi
lack expertise in this area, the Maytrei and Kiily-Tokurit excel, often employing
Akari Mantis geneticists. The Maytrei demand a steep price for their services,
a cost the Ciakahrr are reluctant to pay but have few alternatives. The results of genetic
splicing categorize beings according to their soul matrix, as Reptilians, Greys, and the Nagai
possess a collective hive consciousness rather than an individual soul matrix.
The Ciakahrr Draconians are notorious for their cruel experiments, pushing pain thresholds to
extreme limits to forcibly extract human souls through a process known as "soul scraping," which
utilizes substances like chrome and mercury. Extracted souls are stored in pod containers
and inserted into new hybrid bodies, making them susceptible to control by their captors.
These experiments predominantly occur in underground facilities in North America,
particularly under military bases such as Dulce in New Mexico. It is important to note that
both physical and non-physical extraterrestrial species can successfully crossbreed with humans.
Regarding ship navigation, humanity is not yet prepared for space exploration
without first achieving a higher level of spiritual awakening. Venturing into space
prematurely could pose a risk to other peaceful species. Earth humans must transcend their
hunger for greed and power before advancing technologically and engaging in space travel,
as this is essential not only for their own protection but also for maintaining broader
galactic stability. The Federation struggles to maintain a delicate balance against the
Draconian Empire, the Maytrei, and the Orion Empire, and if humanity starts colonizing and
mining within contested territories, they would do so at their own peril.
The outer layer of Federation ships, in contact with the external environment, is composed of a
unique metal not found on Earth, combined with an organic material that responds to density changes.
For understanding, it resembles a non-sentient bio synthetic intelligence. Between this outer layer,
referred to as the "shell," and the inner solid structure lies a void that enhances the ship’s
adaptability. The external layer shifts shape to align with environmental density,
enabling inter-dimensional and subspace travel. This memory-bound
material reverts to its original form as soon as the frequency shift ends,
providing both protection against particle impacts and a buffer against density shock
waves. This buffer ensures a stable vibratory frequency within the ship.
While we typically travel through inter-dimensional frequency shortcuts,
various methods exist for interstellar navigation. Besides this primary method, the two other common
approaches are echo resonance, similar to quantum resonance (resembling teleportation to human
eyes), and consciousness-based navigation. Some species use natural abilities for consciousness
travel, while others require head implants connected to the ship's system. For the
technology I use, destination coordinates are set and locked, and with our palms placed on
two hexagonal commands on either side of the seat, we can select propulsion—whether transdimensional
or extracontinuum. On approach, the core engine takes over, powered by a cylindrical
ionized plasma module that drives the ship for short-distance navigation.
Located centrally, this plasma core also supplies life-support
and logistical systems like air recycling, lighting, access ramps, and medical bays.
For longer travels, we utilize ambient energy as fuel within the space continuum, known as the
Phyrll, which surrounds the ship as an ionized cloud. Navigation is synchronized with the
pilot’s implant via octagonal controls. Cloaking capabilities are also standard across most ships,
including our own. Cloaking methods vary: some use camouflage by particle rearrangement
(similar to molecular shapeshifting), others use particle reflection to mirror the surroundings,
and some generate a frequency cloud to shift into a different density. In planetary atmospheres,
this may create condensation around the ship, forming a cloud-like appearance. Often,
what seems like ordinary clouds in your sky is actually camouflaged technology.
Teleportation can be achieved through echo resonance, a process involving quantum molecular
transfer that de-materializes molecules at one location to re-materialize them at new
coordinates. Unlike common beliefs on Earth, this doesn’t involve a visible light beam. The light
beams often reported by abductees are actually anti gravitational beams composed of a dense
frequency field, which is why paralysis often occurs during transport. Higher-density beings
can also use remote consciousness, enabling intergalactic operations.
Certain species have crafted ships that only they can operate, made entirely from organic materials
and based on consciousness-driven technology. Constructed in space through harmonics and
frequencies, these vessels are animated with a form of artificial intelligent consciousness,
similar to concepts in your science fiction. They become living entities,
attuned to the frequency signature of their pilot’s consciousness.
These crafts come in many shapes, with spheres, ovoids, and discs being most common, though others
appear interdimensional and can change shape without affecting the internal atmosphere or
its occupants. These unique vessels may appear as pure light or as translucent geometric patterns
like lozenges, spheres, or merkabah shapes, and can shift their atomic structure to become solid.
Capable of instantaneous dimensional transfers or multiverse shifts, these ships maintain their own
stable atmosphere and gravity, allowing them to move at extreme speeds and make sharp-angle turns
without affecting the interior. The environment within remains stable, supported by a holographic
dimensional capsule, with no need for traditional control panels; the pilot’s consciousness sets the
destination through intention alone. Although piloted by consciousness, the actual power
source for the ship is the Phryll—the universal life force present throughout the multiverse.
This technology is among the most advanced, allowing for additional methods of travel,
such as etheric shifting, frequency adjustments, geometric dynamics, and time manipulation.
Time itself, perceived linearly in your dimensional plane, is in reality spherical—a
boundless state where any moment can be accessed from any other, existing only in the present.
If you like this episode, please like and subscribe to Astral Legends for more cosmic
mysteries and legends.... as always.... may the eternal light forever guide your path.
